contextId.occurrenceNote: The inner quote can also be translated as an indirect quote. Alternate translation: "If any one asks you why you are untying it, say" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-quotesinquotes]] and [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-quotations]])
contextId.glQuote: If anyone asks you, 'Why are you untying it?' say
